name: Horao
body:
# Current architecture

A simple viewer designed to listen to commands on its standard input. See doc/protocol.txt for the basic protocol specifications (still subject to changes)

A Python plugin that is used to connect QGIS signals to the viewer (in another process) to allow loading
of QGIS layers with 3D geometries. The plugin depends on a [QGIS branch](https://github.com/Oslandia/Quantum-GIS/tree/postgis3d_and_symbology_emit) where symbology signals have been added.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
